column5: Hey everyone, haven't seen or heard much of anything going on on Lake O lately just wondering if the bite is on anywhere, last couple times out we've had limited success out of Jordan harbour just catching a few small salmon off the dipsy's.  Just trying to figure out where to go on Saturday weather permitting of course! (I'd settle for somewhere other than there but I know the girlfriends dad is set on somewhere to try and pull out some salmon)  if anyone has some insight it'd be greatly appreciated!
I'm having deja vu..  There's another thread a few down with the exact same questions.
is that what bluffers is? never heard it referred to as that.
Bluffers Park in Scarborough is a popular boat launch for Lake Ontario salmon fishers.
Bluffers is the north shore of Lake Ontario, Scarborough.
Ah, learn something new everyday then! Still a ways away from Jordan harbour in niagara region, I'll probably try and talk him into Lake Erie bass & walleye lol
Did you get out this spring on the southern shore?  We had some slammers out there early in the season.

Only been able to manage a handful of times this season out in the boat thus far and nothing really to write home about, lots of boats trolling, marking but not catching so I was beginning to wonder if it was us, the spot or any other sort of superstitious occurrence haha
